---
title: "{{< fa calendar >}} Schedule"
---

This page contains an outline of the topics, content, and assignments for the quarter. Note that this schedule will be updated as the quarter progresses, with all changes documented here.

```{r}
#| label: packages
#| echo: false
#| message: false
#| warning: false

library(googlesheets4)
library(gt)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
#| label: google-sheets-calendar
#| echo: false
#| message: false
#| warning: false

gs4_deauth()
d <- read_sheet("https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1e1qJGTkZfXEYxhU-ni-UL-2s1DbewhebtL1dYYjalgU/edit?usp=sharing")
```


```{r}
#| label: format-calendar-entries
#| echo: false

t <- d |>
  mutate(
    date = ymd(date),
    week = ifelse(is.na(week), "", week)) %>%
  gt() %>%
    text_transform(cells_body(columns = c(prepare)),
                 fn = function(x){
                   ifelse(is.na(x), fontawesome::fa('book', fill_opacity = 0.1), 
                          glue::glue('<a href="{x}"><i class="fa fa-book" style="color: purple;"></i></a>'))
                 }) %>%
  text_transform(cells_body(columns = c(slides)),
                 fn = function(x){
                   ifelse(is.na(x), fontawesome::fa('laptop', fill_opacity = 0.1), 
                          glue::glue('<a href="{x}"><i class="fa fa-laptop" style="color: purple;"></i></a>'))
                 }) %>%
  
  
  text_transform(cells_body(columns = c(activity)),
                 fn = function(x){
                   ifelse(is.na(x), fontawesome::fa('users', fill_opacity = 0.1),
                          glue::glue('<a href="{x}"><i class="fa fa-users" style="color: purple;"></i></a>'))
                   
                 }) %>%
  text_transform(cells_body(columns = c(lab)),
                 fn = function(x){
                   ifelse(is.na(x), fontawesome::fa('pencil', fill_opacity = 0.1), 
                          glue::glue('<a href="{x}"><i class="fa fa-pencil" style="color: purple;"></i></a>'))
                   
                 }) %>%
  text_transform(cells_body(columns = c(portfolio)),
                 fn = function(x){
                   ifelse(is.na(x), fontawesome::fa('file-alt', fill_opacity = 0.1), 
                          glue::glue('<a href="{x}"><i class="fa fa-file-alt" style="color: purple;"></i></a>'))
                 }) %>%
  fmt_date(date, date_style = 9) %>%
  sub_missing(columns = date, missing_text = "") |>
  as_raw_html() 
```
